name: Barnyard Box Bonanza
description:
You are your farmer's best trained chicken. Years of hard physical labor and advancements in mind-enhancing pills has made you into one mighty animal. 

The pigs have just taken all of your farmers apples, and ran into a magical rotating box that was gifted many years ago from a farming wizard!

Get in there, and get those apples back from those pesky pigs!

Utilizes a package made by my college professor.

Most pixel art assets and some programming done by me.

This was my first attempt at developing an actual playable game!
